data.rule:
Event details

1. Event period: 15 - 21 March 2021.

2. Armored Titan Bundle is in the 3x3 cards! 

3. Cards flipping price
-1 time 9 diamonds
-2 time 19 diamonds
-3 time 49 diamonds
-4 time 99 diamonds
-5 time 199 diamonds
-6 time 299 diamonds
-7 time 399 diamonds
-8 time 599 diamonds
-9 time 1199 diamonds

4. Every card can only be flipped once, up to 9 times in total. 

5. Every item you get will go directly to vault/collection/armory.

6. If you have any questions, please contact our customer service from the in-game "News" tab or at: https://mena.ff.support.garena.com/hc/ar/requests/new

transify.COMMON_TIPS_ITEM: the rewards will be sent directly to your vault
transify.UNIQUE_BUY_ALREADY_HAVE: You already own this item, if you purchase it again, it will be converted to FF tokens.
transify.UNIQUE_BUY_ALREADY_HAVE_PART: You already own some of the item(s) you receive. If you receive again, it will be converted to FF tokens.
transify.UNIQUE_REDEEM_ALREADY_HAVE: You already own this item, if you receive it again, it will be converted to FF tokens.
transify.TOAST_GEM_NOT_ENOUGH: insufficient diamonds, please top up and come back again
transify.TOAST_NETWORK_BUSY: Server busy, please try again later
transify.TOAST_NETWORK_ERROR: Network connection error, please try again later
transify.TOAST_OPERATE_BUSY: Too many requests, please try again later
transify.TOAST_SERVER_BUSY: Server busy, please try again later
transify.TOAST_WRONG_REGION: This event is not available for your region
transify.T_FINISH_TIPS: you already claimed all the prizes
transify.T_P_RULE_DESC:
Event details

1. Event time: 28 September - 04 October 2020


2. Champion Boxer Gun Skins is in the 3x3 cards! 


3. Flip card price

-1 time 9 diamonds

-2 time 29 diamonds

-3 time 59 diamonds

-4 time 99 diamonds

-5 time 149 diamonds

-6 time 199 diamonds

-7 time 299 diamonds

-8 time 599 diamonds

-9 time 1199 diamonds


4.Every cards can only be flip once, up to 9 times in total. 


5.Every item you get will goes directly to vault/collection. 


6. If you have any questions regarding this event, please visit our Customer Service website https://mena.ff.support.garena.com/hc/ar
transify.T_P_SAME_FLIP_POS: You cannot flip on same position
transify.T_P_TURN_HINT: Try your luck and flip the cards for a chance to win Armored Titan Bundle
